attributes.review: All I have to say is that when I got this app I thought that I would be able to open my mind to new political views. But I have now decided that I would rather vote for a turkey. As soon as I opened this app it hacked my phone. Now I have to pay to get the horrible news updates off my phone thanks for nothing bunker boy.
attributes.title: If hell was real this is what it would be

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app to support our wonderful president, who is definitely not a terrible human being.🙃 But when i opened the app i was left in pure horror.😱 A picture of a wrinkly oompa loompa popped up.🤢🤮 I was left horrified and my sister was blinded.😔 I was very traumatized and had nightmares of the image of Cheeto man. I received a lot of therapy but i still cant get that horrific image out of my mind.😤😠😥
               DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: 🧚🏻✨traumatizing ✨🧚🏻

attributes.review: ok, i got this app to support my president, but when I opened the app it was so laggy, and asking for too much personal info. i don’t feel safe using this app 😿 I thought I only had to use my email, but it asked much more than that 😡😡😡 I HATE THIS APP, AND THAT CHEETO. i no longer support Mr. Trump 👎 DO NOT GET THIS APP. should not ask for all your personal information. using this app makes me so feel unsafe 😿: (
attributes.title: feeling unsafe 😿

attributes.review:
As a wealthy white conservative mother of 7 beautiful children. I have always supported the rightfully divine leader of our great nation, Donald Trump. I hoped to spend my Sunsay prayer time looking though this great telephone application until I found out it uses the Chinese demon 5G internet that causes coronavirus and brain poisoning. I believe this is a deep state conspiracy to attack me for my beliefs. TRUMP 2020!

And remember, people like me will be voting, will you?
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!! USES 5G

attributes.review: This app is worse system I have ever seen. The first thing I saw was a poor old dude that need to be recommended a better tanning salon. Honestly recommend mars to fulfill his needs. Also think I need latex surgery due to my retinas burning  from the bright orange.  Along with my eyeballs burning someone better help that poor soul gain some common sense. But I didn’t hear that from me 💅🏾.
attributes.title: Pay my medical bills ✨🧚🏽✨💅🏾

attributes.review: This app hacked into my bank account and stole all of my money. Now I can’t even afford to go to therapy so I can heal the damage done to me. I would not recommend this app to any self respecting person on the planet. It should not even be on the App Store at this point. I am shocked that Apple would allow this abomination to exist. PLEASE REMOVE IT IMMEDIATELY so that people are not taken advantage of.
attributes.title: Do not. Just don’t.

attributes.review: hands down worst app i’ve ever encountered!! first i see this degenerate on the very first page, it was so disturbing i was forced to tell my children to vacate the premises!! IF I COULD LEAVE A 0 STAR RATING I WOULD!!! i attempted to sign up as a completely patriotic republican, and i was sent to a page that said loading for 20 straight minutes!!! this was by far the worst president... i mean app i have ever downloaded!!!!
attributes.title: EW Disgusting

attributes.review:
DISGUSTING. i opened the app and got a documentary of an orange spitting while speaking. i tried ignoring it but whenever i clicked on a button i saw a picture of an old prickly cheeto with hair. he certainly went too far with that tan. then i saw ridiculous speeches that are no bueno. horrible. i believe this app must be taken down immediately. asap no rocky. what even is this
🤢. DO NOT RECOMMEND. all fax no printer.
attributes.title: nasty.. do NOT download

attributes.review: This app literally gave everyone in my house COVID after I downloaded it- and on top of that it was so bad that after I downloaded it all my neighbors got cancer 😪✨ 0/10 and would not recommend to anyone, unless you want your neighborhood to die. If I could give this zero stars I would. Please find a new career, maybe one that involves wearing an orange jumpsuit to match your skin tone 🥴😘
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: This app is the absolute WORST. I tried opening it and my phone caught fire. I then had to buy ANOTHER phone (very expensive) and the second I downloaded the app (I hadn’t even opened it yet!) the new phone caught fire as well. Long story short I went through 12 phones trying to open this app and they all caught fire immediately! Sad.
attributes.title: If I Could Rate It 0 Stars I Would
